!Fairy Mimyu: Heh, heh... A Fairy Stone! It's a Fairy Stone... Ha, ha! Yeah, thank you, thank you. You're a really great person! Uh, huh... OK, I'm going to have to give you a gift of gratitude. If Mymyu gets a gift, she always gives a gift in return. What should I do for you? Huh? Huh? Well, ask me for anything later! [Quest _420_LittleWings 30747-03.htm|Ask immediately.]
